                      {

          "position":1,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":"This is Marco Arturo. He's a 12-year-old science fan from Mexico.",

          }

          "@type":"ListItem",
          "position":2,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":"Marco just completed an important investigation into the alleged link between vaccines and autism.",
            "image":"https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-05/31/11/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web05/sub-buzz-13196-1464709629-3.png?resize=625:379",
            "url":"https://www.buzzfeed.com/ishmaeldaro/marco-trolls-anti-vaxxers?sub=4264081_8761654"
          }
        }        ,        {
          "@type":"ListItem",
          "position":3,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":"Marco said he had collected all the evidence in this folder.",
            "image":"https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-05/31/12/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web08/anigif_sub-buzz-12751-1464712045-2_preview.gif?resize=625:344",
            "url":"https://www.buzzfeed.com/ishmaeldaro/marco-trolls-anti-vaxxers?sub=4264081_8762064"
          }
        }        ,        {
          "@type":"ListItem",
          "position":4,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":"Except...",
            "image":"https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-05/31/12/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web05/anigif_sub-buzz-16488-1464713035-2_preview.gif?resize=625:344",
            "url":"https://www.buzzfeed.com/ishmaeldaro/marco-trolls-anti-vaxxers?sub=4264081_8762288"
          }
        }        ,        {
          "@type":"ListItem",
          "position":5,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":""I think it might be because there is absolutely no evidence to support the statement that vaccines are linked to autism in any way whatsoever."",
            "image":"https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-05/31/12/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web04/sub-buzz-17645-1464713520-4.png?resize=625:382",
            "url":"https://www.buzzfeed.com/ishmaeldaro/marco-trolls-anti-vaxxers?sub=4264081_8762369"
          }
        }        ,        {
          "@type":"ListItem",
          "position":6,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":"Marco laid out the case for why vaccines have saved countless people from diseases like measles, meningitis, and polio.",
            "image":"https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-05/31/13/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web08/anigif_sub-buzz-15494-1464714383-1_preview.gif?resize=625:344",
            "url":"https://www.buzzfeed.com/ishmaeldaro/marco-trolls-anti-vaxxers?sub=4264081_8762506"
          }
        }        ,        {
          "@type":"ListItem",
          "position":7,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":"People from all over the world are sending messages of encouragement.",
            "image":"https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-05/31/13/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web11/sub-buzz-8822-1464715309-3.png",
            "url":"https://www.buzzfeed.com/ishmaeldaro/marco-trolls-anti-vaxxers?sub=4264081_8762632"
          }
        }        ,        {
          "@type":"ListItem",
          "position":8,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":"",
            "image":"https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-05/31/13/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web08/sub-buzz-15346-1464715392-1.png",
            "url":"https://www.buzzfeed.com/ishmaeldaro/marco-trolls-anti-vaxxers?sub=4264081_8762640"
          }
        }        ,        {
          "@type":"ListItem",
          "position":9,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":"Marco's video has been viewed more than 3 million times and gotten tens of thousands of likes and comments on his page.",
            "image":"https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-05/31/13/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web15/sub-buzz-6696-1464714647-1.png",
            "url":"https://www.buzzfeed.com/ishmaeldaro/marco-trolls-anti-vaxxers?sub=4264081_8762536"
          }
        }        ,        {
          "@type":"ListItem",
          "position":10,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":"Marco told BuzzFeed News he made the video after a thorough investigation of the purported link between vaccines and autism, saying he reached his conclusions after two months of research.",
            "image":"https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-06/1/14/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web15/sub-buzz-5634-1464804364-3.jpg?resize=625:366",
            "url":"https://www.buzzfeed.com/ishmaeldaro/marco-trolls-anti-vaxxers?sub=4264081_8772670"
          }
        }        ,        {
          "@type":"ListItem",
          "position":11,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":"Marco said he's always loved science, and he wants to be a researcher and science educator. "I want to become well known by people of all ages for what I've done with my life, and I want to do something big enough to change the world as we know it, giving me a place in history."",
            "image":"https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static",
            "url":"https://www.buzzfeed.com/ishmaeldaro/marco-trolls-anti-vaxxers?sub=4264081_8772742"
          }
        }        ,        {
          "@type":"ListItem",
          "position":12,
          "item": {
            "@type" : "Thing",
            "name":""Fortunately, I have the complete support of the scientific community, and once science is on my side, there's nothing on theirs."",
            "image":"https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-05/31/11/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web12/anigif_sub-buzz-31041-1464709038-10_preview.gif",
            "url":"https://www.buzzfeed.com/ishmaeldaro/marco-trolls-anti-vaxxers?sub=4264081_8761548"
          }

		var legacy_structure = params.legacy_structure;
		var dfp_site = params.dfp_site;
		var platform = params.platform;
		var size = params.size;
		if(!wid || !( ( dfp_site && platform && language) || legacy_structure ) || !size) {
			console.error("Error: defineGPTAd requires additional parameters");
			return;
		}

		if(!vertical || vertical == '') { 
			// Add missing vertical info for plugins
			vertical = 'canadanews';

			// Set vertical to value in div.page[data-role="page"][data-uri]
			if(vertical == '') {
				var page = document.getElementsByClassName('page');
				for (i = 0; i < page.length; i++) {
					var div = page[i];
					if(div.getAttribute('data-role') == 'page') {
						vertical = div.getAttribute('data-uri');
						break;
					}
				}
			}

			// Set vertical to BF_DFP_ZONE
			if((typeof BF_DFP_ZONE != 'undefined') && (vertical == '')) vertical = BF_DFP_ZONE.replace(/\//, '');

			// Set vertical to other by default
			if(vertical == '') vertical = 'other';
		}

		// Set vertical index to home
		if(vertical.match(/^index(beta)?$/)) vertical = 'home';
		if(vertical && (foreign_country || vertical == 'usnews')) {
			// Set uknews, aunews, usnews, francenews, etc to 'news'
			vertical = vertical.replace(/.*news$/, 'news');
			// Set francebuzz, ukbuzz, etc to 'buzz'
			vertical = vertical.replace(/.*buzz$/, 'buzz');
		}

		var slotURL;
		if( legacy_structure ) {
			slotURL = '/6556/' + ( position == 'ridealong' ? 'bfd.badge' : BF_DFP_SITE + BF_DFP_ZONE );
		} else {
			slotURL = '/6556/' + dfp_site + test_env + '.' + platform + '/' + language + '/' + vertical + (position ? '/' + position : '');
		}
		var slot = googletag.defineSlot(slotURL, [params.size],'div-gpt-ad-' + wid);

		if (vertical.match(/videos/i)) {
			if (document.cookie && wid === 13) {
				var abPattern = new RegExp("^\\s*abeagle_videos_test=\\s*(.*?)\\s*$");
				var abCookie = document.cookie.split(";").filter(function(str) {
					return abPattern.test(str);
				});
				if (abCookie.length) {
					abCookie = abCookie[0].split('=')[1];
					if (abCookie.match(/control/i)) {
						slot.setTargeting('abtest', 'controlvideos_bigstory');
					}
				}
			}
		}

		return slot;
	}

	function targetGPTAd(params) {
		// Slot and targets objects are required
		if(!params || !params.slot || !params.targets) {
			console.error("Error: targetGPTAd requires additional parameters");
			return;
		}

		// Required parameters
		var slot = params.slot;
		var targets = params.targets;

		// Optional parameters
		var user = params.user;
		var target_buzz = params.target_buzz;

		// Add missing targeting info for plugins
		if(target_buzz && !user) {
			
				targets.nsfw = '0';
				targets.user = 'ishmaeldaro';
				
				targets.bid = '4264081';
				
				
				if(badgeTargets.length) {
					targets.badge = badgeTargets;
				}
				
			
		}

		
		// Ensure the correct badges are being targeted 
		if(params.targets && params.targets.badge) {
			if (badgeTargets.length) {
				params.targets.badge = badgeTargets;
			}else {
				delete params.targets.badge;
			}
		}
		

		// Set targeted values 	
		for (var key in targets) {
			if(targets[key]) slot.setTargeting(key, targets[key]);
		}
		slot.addService(googletag.pubads());
		return slot;
	}

	function displayGPTAd(params) {
		// Slot and wid args are required
		if(!params || !params.slot || !params.wid) {
			console.error("Error: displayGPTAd requires additional parameters");
			return;
		}

		
		// Display msu companion ad
		if ((params.wid == 13) && gptadslots[26] && document.getElementById('div-gpt-ad-26')){
			displayGPTAd({ slot: gptadslots[26], wid: 26 });
		}
		

		// Log to sessionStorage for selenium testing
		if (window.location.search.substring(1).match(/selenium\=true/g) && window.sessionStorage) {
			logGPTAd(params.slot);	
		}
		// Display ad if we're not testing
		else {
			googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-' + params.wid);
			
		}

		return params.slot;
	}

	function logGPTAd(slot) {
		// Slot and wid args are required
		if(!slot) {
			console.error("Error: logGPTAd requires additional parameters");
			return;
		}

		// Get targeted values 
		var targets = {};
		var target_keys = slot.getTargetingKeys();
		for (var i = 0; i < target_keys.length; i++) {
			var key = target_keys[i];
			targets[key] = slot.getTargeting(key).toString();
		}

		// update the total ad count for this page
		if(targets.wid) {
			if(!sessionStorage.getItem('gpt_ad_'+targets.wid)) {
				var ad_count = sessionStorage.getItem('gpt_ad_count');
				ad_count = ad_count ? parseInt(ad_count) : 0;
				sessionStorage.setItem('gpt_ad_count', ad_count+1 );
			}
			// never save abtest info, which frequently changes
			delete targets.abtest;
			// list targets in alphabetical order 
			var ttargets = {};
			var keys = Object.keys(targets).sort();
			keys.forEach(function(value, index) {
				if(value in targets) ttargets[value] = targets[value];
			});
			targets = ttargets;
			// add url and size to log
			var sizes = slot.getSizes();
			var size = [];
			if(sizes.length) {
				sizes = sizes[0]; 
				for (k in sizes) {
					if(typeof sizes[k] == 'number') size.push(sizes[k]);
				}
			}
			var gpt_ad = {
				'targets': targets,
				'url': slot.getAdUnitPath(),
				'size': size.length ? size.join('x') : '',
			};
			// store the parameters passed to loadGPTAd
			sessionStorage.setItem('gpt_ad_'+targets.wid, JSON.stringify(gpt_ad));

		}
		return slot;
	}

		if (expected_ads.length) {
			// Pre-define and target each of the expected_ads
			expected_ads.forEach(function(ad) {
				if (!ad.wid) return;

				
				// Skip ridealongs for non-targeted badges
				if (
					ad.targets
					&& (ad.position == 'ridealong')
					&& (badgeCampaigns.indexOf(ad.targets.campaign) == -1)
				) return;
				

				// Set up ad 
				if (!gptadslots[ad.wid]) {
					// Define ad
					gptadslots[ad.wid] = defineGPTAd(ad);
					ad.slot = gptadslots[ad.wid];
					// Target ad
					if (gptadslots[ad.wid]) targetGPTAd(ad);
				}
			});
		}
		

		googletag.pubads().setTargeting('poe', BF_REFERER);
		googletag.pubads().setTargeting('abtest', AD_DESIGN);
		googletag.pubads().setTargeting('ord', BF_DFP_ORD.toString());
		/* Add DFP Tag Terms */
		googletag.pubads().setTargeting('tag', [''] );

			var slot = event.slot;

			// Get targeted values 
			var targets = {};
			var target_keys = slot.getTargetingKeys();
			for (var i = 0; i < target_keys.length; i++) {
				var key = target_keys[i];
				targets[key] = slot.getTargeting(key).toString();
			}	
		
			// Determine whether ad loaded successfully
			var loaded = !event.isEmpty && event.size && event.size[0] && event.size[1];

			// Return from slotRenderEnded if nothing is targeted
			if(!targets) return;

			// Headerstrip ads
			if(targets.wid && (targets.wid == '10')) {
				if(loaded) {
					// remove backfill buzz
					var backfill = document.getElementsByClassName("unit js-backfill");
					if(backfill.length) backfill[0].remove();
					// show ad unit
					var ad_unit = document.getElementById('div-gpt-ad-'+targets.wid).parentNode.parentNode;
					ad_unit.className = ad_unit.className.replace(/\s+hidden/g, '');
				}
			// Top SWARM ads
			} else if(targets.wid && (targets.wid == '41' || targets.wid == '40')) {
				if (loaded) {
					// show ad unit
					var ad_unit = document.getElementById('BF_WIDGET_'+targets.wid);
					ad_unit.className = ad_unit.className.replace(/\s+hidden/g, '');
				}
			}

		});
		googletag.pubads().enableAsyncRendering();		googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();		googletag.enableServices();
	});

		}
	} catch(err) { console.log(err); }

			<p class="print"><a href="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-05/31/12/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web04/sub-buzz-17645-1464713520-4.png?resize=625:382" rel="nofollow"><b>View this image ›</b></a></p>
			
		</div>
	
	
					
			  
				<div class="sub_buzz_source_via buzz_attribution">Marco Arturo / Facebook</div>
				
			
		
	

	
		
			<p class="sub_buzz_desc_w_attr">Marco is right, of course. There is absolutely <a href="http://www.cdc.gov/vaccinesafety/concerns/autism.html"><b>no link</b></a> between vaccines and autism. And any research that suggested there was has been repeatedly <a href="https://www.sciencebasedmedicine.org/lancet-retracts-wakefield-article/">debunked</a> and <a href="http://www.bmj.com/content/342/bmj.c7452">repudiated</a> by the scientific community.</p>
		
	

	</div>

</div>

				<img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAPAAAAAAAAAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" rel:bf_image_src="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-06/1/14/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web15/sub-buzz-5634-1464804364-3.jpg?resize=625:366" class="bf_dom image not-graphic-image js-image js-not-graphic " rel:bf_bucket="progload" width="625" height="366" alt="Marco told BuzzFeed News he made the video after a thorough investigation of the purported link between vaccines and autism, saying he reached his conclusions after two months of research." />
								<div class="pinit" style="left: 550px; top: 377px;">
					<a class="pin sub-buzz-pinterest-share bf_dom" href="javascript:;" rel:gt_act="share/pinterest/pin/list-item:10"
				   rel:bf_bucket_data='{"pin-share":{"id":"4264081_8772670","not_a_sub":true}}' rel:sub_title=''>
					   	<span class="icon"></span>
				   	</a>
			    </div>
				
			

		

	
			
		
			
		
			<p class="print"><a href="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-06/1/14/asset/buzzfeed-prod-web15/sub-buzz-5634-1464804364-3.jpg?resize=625:366" rel="nofollow"><b>View this image ›</b></a></p>
			
		</div>
	
	
					
			  
				<div class="sub_buzz_source_via buzz_attribution">Marco Arturo / Facebook</div>
				
			
		
	

	
		
			<p class="sub_buzz_desc_w_attr">“I read every article [anti-vaccine activists] used as evidence and I realized that the articles either didn’t say what they claimed they did, or they were fraudulent articles found in non-trustable websites,” he said. “After questioning if vaccines were really safe, and researching on the topic, I got to the conclusion that vaccines had nothing to do with autism.”</p>

<p>He said he hopes people realize that “vaccines have done a lot more good than damage” and that except for very specific medical cases, everyone should vaccinate their children for the sake of public health.</p>
		
	

	</div>

	

	


















    <div class="reuseble-id instapaper_ignore hidden">ID: 8772670</div>

</div>















<div class="buzz_superlist_item buzz-superlist-item buzz_superlist_item_text buzz-superlist-item-text  buzz_superlist_item_wide   " id="superlist_4264081_8772742" rel:buzz_num="11">






	

<div class="solid">


	<h2 class="subbuzz_name" data-subbuzz-id="8772742"><span class="buzz_superlist_number_inline">11.</span> Marco said he’s always loved science, and he wants to be a researcher and science educator. “I want to become well known by people of all ages for what I’ve done with my life, and I want to do something big enough to change the world as we know it, giving me a place in history.”</h2>

<p class="sub_buzz_desc">He said that while most of the feedback he’s gotten to his video has been positive, there have been some haters, too. </p>

<p>“Some people tell me I should have been aborted, others tell me I’m an annoying autistic child, and others that I’m the living proof that vaccines cause retardation.”</p>


</div>






	
					
		
	














    <div class="reuseble-id instapaper_ignore hidden">ID: 8772742</div>

</div>















<div class="buzz_superlist_item buzz-superlist-item buzz_superlist_item_image buzz-superlist-item-image  buzz_superlist_item_wide image_hit  " id="superlist_4264081_8761548" rel:buzz_num="12">








	
	<div class="solid">
	
	<h2 class="subbuzz_name" data-subbuzz-id="8761548"><span class="buzz_superlist_number_inline">12.</span> “Fortunately, I have the complete support of the scientific community, and once science is on my side, there’s nothing on theirs.”</h2>

    <script type="text/javascript">
function loadScript(script) {
    var deferred = Q.defer();
    var scriptEl = document.createElement('script');
    scriptEl.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript');
    scriptEl.setAttribute('src', script);
    scriptEl.onload = function() {
        deferred.resolve();
    };
    document.body.appendChild(scriptEl);
    return deferred.promise;
}

EventManager.observe_once(
    "acl:load:done",
    function() {
        var u = new BF_User();
        if (u) {
            u = u.getUserInfo();
        }
        if (acl.user_can('duplicate_post') || acl.user_can('feedback_tool')) {
            var scriptEl = document.createElement('script');
            scriptEl.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript');
            scriptEl.setAttribute('src', 'https://webappstatic.buzzfeed.com/static/js/public/q/q.js');
        }

        scriptEl.onload = function() {

            if (acl.user_can('feedback_tool')) {
                Q.all([
                  loadScript('https://webappstatic.buzzfeed.com/static/js/html2canvas/html2canvas.js'),
                  loadScript('https://webappstatic.buzzfeed.com/static/js/t3/services/user.js?v=1477684150'),
                  loadScript('https://webappstatic.buzzfeed.com/static/js/t3/services/image-proxier.js?v=1477684150'),
                  loadScript('https://webappstatic.buzzfeed.com/static/js/t3/modules/feedback-widget-trigger.js?v=1477684150'),
                  loadScript('https://webappstatic.buzzfeed.com/static/js/t3/modules/feedback-widget.js?v=1477684150'),
                  loadScript('https://webappstatic.buzzfeed.com/static/js/t3/modules/screenshot-canvas.js?v=1477684150'),
                ])
                .then(function() {
                  var triggerEl = document.querySelector('.js-usernav-feedback');
                  triggerEl.setAttribute('data-module', 'feedback-widget-trigger');
                  Box.Application.start(triggerEl); // like init but for a single module

                  var widgetEl = document.querySelector('.js-feedback-widget');
                  widgetEl.setAttribute('data-module', 'feedback-widget');
                  Box.Application.start(widgetEl); // like init but for a single module

                  var canvasEl = document.querySelector('.js-screenshot-canvas');
                  canvasEl.setAttribute('data-module', 'screenshot-canvas');
                  Box.Application.start(canvasEl);
                });
            }
            if (acl.user_can('duplicate_post')) {
              Q.all([
                  loadScript('https://webappstatic.buzzfeed.com/static/js/t3/modules/superduper.js?v=1477684150')
                ])
                .then(function() {
                  var triggerEl = document.querySelector('[data-module="superduper"]');
                  Box.Application.start(triggerEl); // like init but for a single module
                });

            }
            
        }
        document.body.appendChild(scriptEl);
    }
);

</script>
